featured.headline: OpenAI reportedly finalizing $100B deal at more than $850B valuation
featured.summary: OpenAI is reportedly getting close to closing a $100 billion deal, with backers including Amazon, Nvidia, SoftBank, and Microsoft. The deal would value the ChatGPT-maker at $850 billion....

secondary_1.headline: Reload wants to give your AI agents a shared memory

secondary_2.headline: OpenAI, Reliance partner to add AI search to JioHotstar
